title: Custom
description: Upload or specify a custom color.

title: Multi-Blue
description: Multi-Blue is a tried and true combo for resin projects thanks to the water-like essence that flows between the wood grains. This elegant color palette has traveled in national and international projects both past and present.

title: Multi-Grey
description: Multi-Grey is a popular choice for many modern, toned-down interiors, and is often the go-to for designers and owners alike. It brings the wood and room together as a centerpiece, and complements as a side piece.

title: Copper Blend
description: Our Copper Blend is a beautiful and timeless way to add a splash of color to a table while matching the tone of Walnut, or contrasting lighter woods.

title: Multi-Green
description: Multi-Green is a palette that brings a splash of life and color to a room. This color set goes well in businesses and offices, fitting with the wood and giving the room a continuous theme.

title: Dark Grey
description: Our translucent Dark Grey is ideal when a consistent, subtle color is needed. It blends with both darker and lighter woods without creating distractions or sacrificing the beauty of a finished piece.

title: Caviar Black
description: Caviar Black is our darkest translucent color. Unlike Solid Black, it shows the traditional epoxy figure through the pigment's glittery highlights while still maintaining its deep black color.

title: Solid Black
description: Solid Black is a good color when a statement is needed, whether it is one of subtlety with darker woods, or contrast with lighter ones.
